translated: “Come now, my son, tell me a one-line saying,
Which is the source of many a truth,
Some saying that will be a help to us,
And will bring us to our goal.”
“I will tell you a one-line saying,
Which is the source of many a truth,
And which is bound up with virtue,
It is enough to make friends happy,
The One-Line Jātaka is the eighth.
